title: mallman
author: mallman
content: is it ok to advertise link to faucets or other platforms to earn some satoshi ?

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: mallman on September 21, 2023, 09:23:17 PMis it ok to advertise link to faucets or other platforms to earn some satoshi ?Depending on how you are going to do it, if you’re going to insert it I. Your signature space (which you can’t do because of your rank) it will be okay, or if you just put it in your profile “website space” that will do too. But if you’re talking about including it in your post and spamming the forum with it, that’s not accepted and it will lead to your account getting banned.

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: There are certain spots in this forum that the mods will let you advertise these sites, but you can't just post it willy-nilly everywhere or else you'd risk getting your post deleted, and worse, your account getting banned. It's a simple concept really that everyone here has to follow. You could also look into advertising your site through signature campaigns in this forum which you could check here bitcointalk services tab. Once you're done with checking, gauge your choices and decide whether cut and dry advertising is what you're going for, or you wish to make this into a full-on career for other people with the guaranteed benefit of getting clicks and backlinks to your site.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: mallman on September 21, 2023, 09:23:17 PMis it ok to advertise link to faucets or other platforms to earn some satoshi ?There are decent ways of advertising a site or product here on the forum. You can make a detailed Ann thread about the site depending on where it is best suited for what you want to advertise, and as long as you are not going to include a link that has a virus on it or can steal other data and is not also proven to be a malicious scam website, I think you are good to go and you can advertise here on the forum. I also think referral links are not allowed, which I think might affect your promotion because people with whom you are sharing their link might not know when others click on it from here.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: mallman on September 21, 2023, 09:23:17 PMis it ok to advertise link to faucets or other platforms to earn some satoshi ?You can advertise your site with the help of personal text, signature space, and by adding it on your profile's Website field. The other way to advertise your link is to run a signature campaign on the forum so that the members will apply your link's signature on their profiles and you'll get exposure to your site. Another way that you can use to advertise your link is to make a proper announcement thread in micro earnings board and share details about your faucet there.  You can also launch a review campaign so that the users can learn about your site by reading the honest reviews of the reputed members of the forum.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Yes, only in the Micro Earnings board as ANN thread of service/faucet. Or as suggested on your signature or PM text. Other than that, you can't

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: mallman on September 21, 2023, 09:23:17 PMis it ok to advertise link to faucets or other platforms to earn some satoshi ?If these faucets are good and pay users, you can make a list, continue to update it and put links to those faucets, but the problem is with the referral links. You can put them in your signature when you reach the appropriate rank, or at least put a link and ask the users to PM you to get the referral link in private if they want to support you, but you couldn't make it public.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: It is allowed if you do faucet in Bitcoin BTC, but it is not allowed if you do faucet or airdrop in altcoins. Your faucet must have good security and detection against cheating.Giveaway threads are not allowedQuoteMost giveaway threads are no longer allowed in the Alternate cryptocurrencies sections. From now on, posting or replying to such threads could result in being banned. Existing threads will be locked.Specifically, you are not allowed to give people any incentive to post insubstantial posts in your threads. You can't offer to pay people who post their addresses, usernames, etc. You can do giveaways off-site and link to the giveaway page in a thread, but you can't give people any bonus for replying to your thread.Similar threads are already restricted to Games and Rounds in the non-altcoin sections, but the giveaway-related post volume is so high in the altcoin sections that I've decided to just ban them entirely here.

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: mallman on September 21, 2023, 09:23:17 PMis it ok to advertise link to faucets or other platforms to earn some satoshi ?This forum does not support referral / affiliate link promotion. But you can promote all types of crypto or gambling related projects here through ANN or signature or Bounty campaign. There are announcement threads for many projects and signature, bounty campaigns.  But you won't find anyone doing affiliate link promotion. hope you understood this matter as wellFor Signature campaign promotion with Bitcoin payment visit  Services Board For Signature campaign and Bounty Campaign promotion with altcoins payment visit Bounties (Altcoins) Board ANN promotion for altcoins project visit  Announcements (Altcoins) ANN promotion for Gambling project Visit Gambling Board

comments.body: Quote from: mallman on September 21, 2023, 09:23:17 PMis it ok to advertise link to faucets or other platforms to earn some satoshi ?Your best option is to create a website where you can house all the faucets that you want to promote, with a  website you can promote as many faucets as you want, and you can review each faucet and post your payment proofs and create your own announcement thread about your reviews on faucets where you are active.I have friends who got a lot of referrals by reviewing faucets and posting payment proofs, by having your own website, you give value to your readers there are a lot of tutorials about setting up a site on the internet Wordpress is the best option to start a website.

comments.body: Quote from: mallman on September 21, 2023, 09:23:17 PMis it ok to advertise link to faucets or other platforms to earn some satoshi ?You should not create an incomplete title when creating a thread give us an idea of what your post is all about so people will not guess what is your question, and about your question no you cannot if it is a referral link but if you own the faucet you can create a thread in micro eaning section and I doubt you can find people here who want to do Faucets, because the community thinks that faucets are just a waste of time, if you do not have hundreds of active referrals who are all clicking you can't reach the payout threshold.
